text: Get Up Offa That Thing is the 43rd studio album by American musician James Brown. The album was released in July 1976, by Polydor Records. ==Track listing== All tracks composed by Deanna Brown, Deirdre Brown and Yamma Brown; except where indicated. ==Personnel== *James Brown - lead vocals, arrangements *Patricia Dryden - cover illustration ==References== Category:1976 albums Category:James Brown albums Category:Albums produced by James Brown Category:Polydor Records albums
title: Get Up Offa That Thing (album)
